[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@anglr/grid](./grid.md) &gt; [PluginDescription](./grid.plugindescription.md)

## PluginDescription interface

Defines interface, that describes minimal set of parameters for specifying plugin for grid

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface PluginDescription<PluginType> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [instance](./grid.plugindescription.instance.md) | <code>PluginType</code> | If specified, allows to pass existing instance of plugin to grid, overriding dynamic creation, if it is visual plugin must be rendered outside of grid |
|  [instanceCallback](./grid.plugindescription.instancecallback.md) | <code>(instance: PluginType &#124; null) =&gt; void</code> | Optional callback used for obtaining dynamic instance of plugin (allows direct communication with plugin) |
|  [options](./grid.plugindescription.options.md) | <code>PluginOptions</code> | Options that will be passed to dynamically instantiated plugin |
|  [type](./grid.plugindescription.type.md) | <code>Type&lt;PluginType&gt; &#124; null</code> | Type of plugin that will be dynamically instantiated |
